title: How to write a letter as a student who is asking for a certificate - Quora

response.answer_text: Writing an application for issuing original certificate This is a format for writing a formal application letter to the school /college principal. xx-xx-xxxx (Date) To, The Principal xxxxxxxxxx (school name) xxxxxx (place) Subject: Application for issuing original certificates (conduct certificate/Transfer certificate/Date of Birth). Sir/Ma'am, I am xxxxx(your name), admission number xxxxx and I am a student of class xxxxxx(class/department and division) in your school. With due respect, I would like to inform you that I would like to have my original certificates (conduct certificate/ Transfer certificate/Date of Birth - as the case maybe) for applying for a scholarship/sports event/etc. Therefore, I request you to kindly issue me the original certificate at the earliest. Yours obediently Xxxxxxx (your name) Class/Department: Admission No:  Source: Manikandan M.S.'s answer to How do I write an issue for an original certificate by a school principal? I hope this answer is helpful to you. Thank you.
